definitions.definition: A feeling of being displeased with something or someone; dissatisfaction ; disapproval .
That which displeases; cause of irritation or annoyance; offence; injury.
A state of disgrace or disfavour .

main_definition: A feeling of being displeased with something or someone; dissatisfaction ; disapproval .
secondary_definitions: That which displeases; cause of irritation or annoyance; offence; injury.
A state of disgrace or disfavour .
